Species: Iberian Lynx (Lynx paradinus)

EUNIS Home > Kingdom: Animalia > Phylum: Chardata > Class: Mammalia > Order: Carnivaro > Family: Felidae > Genus: Lynx > Species: Lynx pardinus > See subspecies
Next Previous

More images

Quick Facts

First named 1824 as "Felis pardina" by Temminck

It has 5 scientific synonyms and 22 common names

Protected in 94 sites in Europe.

Mentioned in 5 legal instruments.

Lives in 3 habitat types.

How is this species doing?

International threat status

World

Unknown

Europe Vulnerable

(IUCN, 2010)

EU Critically endangered

(IUCN, 2006)

See full table details Other resources
